title: Athletism — Climbing (Elite) — Phase 5: Strength → Power (RFD) & Contact Time
equipment: Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, kettlebells, cables
Weighted vest, sandbags, farmer carry handles
Rock shoes, approach shoes, helmet, rope (as needed)
goal: Convert strength to faster contact, dynamic movement confidence.

warmup: Activation 8' (scap control, deep core, glute med)
Easy traverse or banded forearm prep 5'
main: Campus (intro): 6x low rung ladder (controlled, no max throw)
Dyno practice 6x6 attempts on easy problems

notes: Week 1: light/mod Olympic derivatives. Week 2: add campus intro (controlled).
